applicability_reasoning: This regulation specifically requires warning statements for advertisements containing illustrations or simulated performance figures. The document provided is a comprehensive pension scheme rules document that outlines the terms, conditions, and operational aspects of a pension life cover scheme. While the document contains detailed information about benefits, definitions, and scheme operations, it does not contain any advertisements, illustrations, or simulated performance figures that would trigger the requirement for the specified warning statement. The document is purely informational and contractual in nature, setting out the legal framework and rules of the pension scheme rather than marketing or promotional content with performance illustrations.
regulation_title: Warning statement to be provided where illustrations or information on simulated performance
regulation_text: 389. A regulated entity shall ensure that an advertisement which contains illustrations or information on simulated performance contains the following warning statement: "Warning: These figures are estimates only. They are not a reliable guide to the future performance of this investment." Conditions for describing product as guaranteed or conveying the same meaning or impression
source_name: CENTRAL BANK (SUPERVISION AND ENFORCEMENT) ACT 2013 (SECTION 48) (CONSUMER PROTECTION) REGULATIONS 2025
